none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 27, 2009 Description from Terminal Escape:
Five songs in six minutes, this is my kind of hardcore! I could drop loads of early '80s references and claim them as influences on LIFE TRAP, but this is just killer hardcore punk with a guitarist who was clearly weaned on all the classics.  This makes my want to punch holes in the wall like I did the first time I heard BAD BRAINS (this doesn't sound anything like BAD BRAINS, I'm just saying that when I was 14 living in Oklahoma and I heard I Against I, I wanted to punch holes in my wall).  This shit rules, enjoy. LIFE TRAP
//2.bp.blogspot.com/_UWPI3C1CSoU/Sr-MHnji61I/AAAAAAAAAOM/tpwH50Su9hY/s1600-h/Life+Trap+cover.jpg
